package.name: eggNotch隐藏刘海-Rootless
package.shortDescription: Hide the notch on notched iPhones. Choose status bar background color, text color, corner radius, and Y-axis adjustment for newer devices.有些用户觉得刘海屏丑，使用此插件可以进行隐藏！
